sense.def:
To submit to something
pomeni nekaj sprejeti, ker nimamo dovolj moči, da bi se tistemu postavili po robu.

seg.quote: They were forced to submit to military discipline.

sense.def:
To submit a proposal or application to someone
pomeni poslati predlog ali prošnjo nekomu, da bi se lahko odločil, ali jo bo sprejel ali ne.
